title: The Vacation
description: Jess is devastated when her boyfriend breaks up with her but she is convinced by her friends to still go on the Caribbean vacation that they had planned before he dumped her. She decides to reinvent herself and live life with abandon for the week that she is on the island and embarks on a wonderful adventure with a man she meets at the bar. The only problem is- this man is someone who is very connected to her life and when she finds out who he is, her world explodes.
author: Helen    Cooper
